name: Bees Like Trees
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 46 - Thanks for playing :D

(Note that the mouse controls are a bit wonky in browser but work better on the windows build)

Game:

You play as a bee. Plant and water trees to get fruit, which can either be sold for water and points or planted as another tree.

Controls:

  • WASD or ARROWS to move
  • Look with MOUSE
  • E to plant fruit seeds or to complete an order
  • SPACE to toggle water
  • SCROLL to switch fruit
  • ESC to pause game
